summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackSo dewy, you won't believe your eyes: Bubble's Star Dew Hydrating Eye Cream deeply moisturizes dryness to help make under eyes feel smooth, soft, and hydrated. The rich, pillowy texture feels comforting on skin and provides a radiant, luminous finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates and soothes dry under eyesHelps prevent moisture lossDelivers a luminous, dewy finishSuitable for sensitive skinKey IngredientsAnti-Stress Blend of peptides and plant extracts helps counteract the effects of digital pollution and helps to relieve signs of fatigue and stress.Shea Butter helps moisturize, nourish, and soothe the delicate under eye area.Squalane helps draw water into the skin.Item 2634732How To UseApply to clean, dry skin (after treatments and before moisturizer) by gently tapping cream onto your under eye area.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Niacinamide, Glycol Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco-Glucoside, Acetic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Anhydroxylitol, Caffeine, Chrysin, Diheptyl Succinate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Pentylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopherol, Xylitol, Xylitylglucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin (after treatments and before moisturizer) by gently tapping cream onto your under eye area.

reviews.headline: Clean Packaging and Moisturizing
reviews.comments: I like how this uses a pump, instead of being in a tube,as many eye creams are. Easier to control. Again, a little goes a long way. It is gentle and cost effective.Plus it has peptides. It gives a gentle glow to the under eyes.

reviews.headline: Eyes watery
reviews.comments: I love the feel of this it does exactly what it needs to do but it does make my eyes water like crazy after i apply the only flaw

reviews.headline: oww
reviews.comments: For reference, I have dry and sensitive skin. I only used it 3 times before I began to notice a slight burn/stinging sensation on my skin where I applied it. I didn't notice any results but I only used it a handful of times inconsistenly bc I just couldn't with how it felt. Maybe someone else's holy grail, but too strong to be mine

reviews.headline: Terrible Pump
reviews.comments: I LOVE this eye cream. Its lightwieght yet moisturizing. I have dry skin and this really does the trick even though it feels so light. Unfortunately the pump is absolutely terrible. It gets stuck and the will squirt the product so intensely that it flies across my bathroom. I've probably wasted as much product on the floor of my bathroom as I've actually used. Please switch the packaging to a squeeze bottle or glass container.

reviews.headline: Cute Bottle, Good Extra Dry skin Pick
reviews.comments: You get a lot of Bubble Star Dew eye cream in a cute lilac bottle. It's a good price. The pump dispensed the perfect amount w/just a gentle tap . Several eye cream pumps give huge blobs. I've used eye products w/butters in the ingredient lists but this one was too rich. It made my concealer separate sooner than usual. I even tried it overnight & woke up to sticky undereye skin. I could see extra dry skin drinking this up. I have combo/oily w/dry undereyes sometimes dry enough to see flakiness.

reviews.headline: Please redesign the pump
reviews.comments: I really like this eye cream. Its simple but moisturizes really well. I removed a star because the pump often gets stuck and, when it releases, it ends up dispensing way too much product. Feels like a big waste

reviews.headline: The pump is trash
reviews.comments: The moisturizer itself is fine, but the pump is the worst. Either no product comes out or a ton of it comes out and it tends to shoot out all over the place. For this reason I will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: MISLEADING SIZED BOTTLE
reviews.comments: The size of the bottle is EXTREMELY MISLEADING!! I was wondering why I went through this cream in 1.5 months. I thought the pump was stuck. I removed it to find that most of the bottle is SOLID and has the tiniest amount of space inside for the cream. 10% of the whole bottle actually has product. if you have this product unscrew the top and you will see what im talking about. so misleading, shame on the company! Will not buy this brand again!!!

reviews.headline: First Eye Cream to Ever Show Real Results
reviews.comments: For years I've tried numerous different eye creams and never really saw any difference. But within weeks of using this inexpensive one, I noticed my under-eyes looked smoother and plumper! Couldn't recommend it more.

reviews.headline: Safe for sensitive, dermatitis-prone skin!
reviews.comments: Love this! I get sebhorreic dermatitis around my eyes- extreme dryness, flaking, irritation- and i use this cream in the morning before i apply makeup and it seems to create a nice moisturizing, protective barrier between my skin and my makeup. Typically makeup causes dermatitis flare-ups for me right away, and this has seemed to prevent that! Very grateful for this product for my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Like it but slides into contacts
reviews.comments:
This eye cream applies smoothly and is hydrating.  I have sensitive skin, and the cream did not cause any flare ups or milia which I sometimes get from other eye creams.  Unfortunately, I will not be repurchasing because it slides into my eyes and thus into my contacts.  
At this price point, I would recommend it to others looking for hydration around the eye area as long as they are not contact lens wearers.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Works well and does the job and its not like drunk elephant and over 40 dollars for one thing i love how its cheep and amazing quality

reviews.headline: i would buy this AGAIN!
reviews.comments: amazing product!

reviews.headline: Brightens under eye
reviews.comments: I have used alot of under eye cream, but this one is so good. I immediately saw a difference in the brightness and less puffyness. Its dewy and makes you look awake. Great product.

reviews.headline: Obsessed my sigmas!!!
reviews.comments:
It is an amazing product
Bubble absolutely slayyyed with this scrumptious eye cream hehehehehe

reviews.headline: Obsessed!!
reviews.comments: I LOVE it!! Its ao creamy and smooth. It feels so nice under my eyes and definitely gives me a hydrated look

reviews.headline: Wow wow wow
reviews.comments: Genuinely shocked by how nice this feels on the skin. I've used many other eye creams but this is defo the best!

reviews.headline: Saved my under eyes!
reviews.comments: This product is so hydrating and smooth. It has absolutely saved my under eyes by getting rid of my dark circles and making them less puffy.

reviews.headline: Smooth, hydrating eye cream that is affordable!
reviews.comments:
Another Bubble product I love. I typically apply it at night after using Bubble's Water Slide. 

What I like most about it is its smooth texture and affordability. As someone in my early 30's, eye cream is now a must.

reviews.headline: Affordable & effective!
reviews.comments: So hydrating and layers well underneath my concealer. Can't get much better for the price!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've tried countless eye creams, but the Bubble Star Dew Hydrating Eye Cream stands out as one of the best. From the very first use, I could feel an immediate difference. The texture is light, yet deeply hydrating, absorbing into the skin effortlessly without any greasy residue.

My under-eye area, which is often dry and prone to puffiness, felt instantly refreshed and nourished. After using it consistently for a couple of weeks, I've noticed a significant reduction in puffiness and dark circles. My skin feels noticeably smoother and more plump, which is exactly what I've been looking for.

What I love most about this eye cream is how it gives my skin a subtle, dewy glow without feeling heavy or sticky. It's incredibly soothing and gentle, making it perfect for sensitive skin. Plus, the fresh, clean scent is a nice bonusâ€”nothing too overpowering, just a calming fragrance.

If you're looking for an eye cream that actually delivers visible results and provides long-lasting hydration, this is definitely worth trying!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Game-Changer for My Eyes!

faceoff_negative.comments: You get a lot of Bubble Star Dew eye cream in a cute lilac bottle. It's a good price. The pump dispensed the perfect amount w/just a gentle tap . Several eye cream pumps give huge blobs. I've used eye products w/butters in the ingredient lists but this one was too rich. It made my concealer separate sooner than usual. I even tried it overnight & woke up to sticky undereye skin. I could see extra dry skin drinking this up. I have combo/oily w/dry undereyes sometimes dry enough to see flakiness.
faceoff_negative.headline: Cute Bottle, Good Extra Dry skin Pick
